# Draft:Colors Golen Petal Award

| country = India
| presenter = Colors TV
| awarded_for = Excellence in hindi television
}}
The Golden Petal Awards is an annual award ceremony presented by Colors TV to recognize and honor the achievements of individuals and programs within the Colors network. These awards celebrate the contributions of actors, actresses, and shows to the network's success and popularity.
Golden Petal Awards is an indian award function to honour characters and programs as a reward for their incomparable contribution to the Colors TV network.
History
The first Golden Petal Awards ceremony was held in 2011 in Mumbai, India to honour outstanding portrayal of the characters from the shows of Colors TV. The event was hosted by filmmaker Sajid Khan and attended by Bollywood celebrities such are Salman Khan, Deepika padukone and Akshay kumar.
